snippet.title: Disfigure Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo available on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2083160/Disfigure

Disfigure is a top-down shooter in which you fight in an arena full of increasingly grotesque creatures. Both ammo and vision are limited resources, use both efficiently to survive as long as possible.
